question: To make sure that the cake is sweet, he needs 450 lbs. of sugar. If he has 287 lbs. of sugar stored in his house, how much additional sugar will he need?
response:
To make sure that the cake is sweet, he needs 450 lbs. of sugar. If he has 287 lbs. of sugar stored in his house, he needs to add 450 - 287 = 163 lbs. of sugar.

The answer is 163 lbs.
